roleset.name: Yammer

role.descr: Complaint, thing Yammered, topic of Yammering

example.name: Quotative
example.text: ["I wouldn't want any of that stuff inside of me,"]-1 he yammered *-1

roleset.note: Automatically created based on framefiles: moan (37.3), added by Kev

example.name: With Particle
example.text: I stood there for three minutes while he yammered away on the phone and didn't even acknowledge me.

example.name: With Particle (2)
example.text: She yammered on about "do you trust this administration", and spewed more right-wing, bizarro-world talking points.
